definition: face/side/surface/aspect/top/classifier for flat surfaces such as drums, mirrors, flags etc

sentences.english: First, I cut an access hole in the Bridge Deck and glued the Wheelhouse to it.
sentences.chinese: 首先，我削減一進入洞，在橋面和膠合板舵手給它。

sentences.english: In china, the micro-surfacing is mostly used to bituminous pavement and cement concrete deck at present.
sentences.chinese: 在我國，微表處目前大多用於瀝青路面和水泥砼橋面。

sentences.english: The deck system is composed of stiffening girder and supporting system is composed of steel cables.
sentences.chinese: 其橋面體系由加勁梁構成，支承體系由鋼索組成。

sentences.english: The second picture shows the damage and the mortar repairs.
sentences.chinese: 第二章照片顯示了橋面板的破壞情況和砂漿修補情況。

sentences.english: Deck pavement, as deck protection course, is one part of bridge superstructure.
sentences.chinese: 橋面鋪裝是橋樑上部結構的組成部分，即橋面保護層。

sentences.english: Deck pavement, as deck protection course, is one part of bridge superstructure.
sentences.chinese: 橋面鋪裝是橋樑上部結構的組成部分，即橋面保護層。

sentences.english: The grout is installed after final adjustment and installation of the roadway wearing surface.
sentences.chinese: 灌漿是在最終調整和安裝橋面磨耗層以後進行的。

sentences.english: It's very similar to fibers that we have on the deck.
sentences.chinese: 這些和鋪在橋面上的纖維很相似。

sentences.english: The all-welded, A-frame pylon straddles the deck.
sentences.chinese: 全焊接的A形框架式的塔柱與橋面叉開。

sentences.english: The pylon cell units were hoisted to the deck by the transfer derrick .
sentences.chinese: 塔室塊件由傳遞用的轉臂吊機吊放在橋面上。

sentences.english: Signs and flyers littered the roadway, including the one from Christine Velez poking fun at Mitt Romney and Rick Perry.
sentences.chinese: 標語和傳單在小雨中散落在橋面。

sentences.english: The bars were welded to the deck plate .

definition: pipeline/general term for pipes, cables etc
Dr Sun Yat-sen (1866-1925), first president of the Republic of China and co-founder of the Kuomintang/same as 孫中山|孙中山
